title: Natural Balance Therapies | LinkedIn
description: Natural Balance Therapies | 30 seguidores en LinkedIn. Open 7 days a week, we have 5 treatment rooms in central Hove and a team of friendly Osteopaths and Massage Therapists. | We offer Clinical Advanced Massage, Myofascial Release, Osteopathy, Acupuncture and relaxing holistic treatments from our centre in Brighton & Hove. From booking to aftercare, our service is professional, relaxed and caring. All our therapists are trained in advanced techniques to get the best result for you.
